articles.description: Crystal Palace are unsuccessful in their appeal against being demoted from the Europa League and will play in the Conference League this season.
articles.title: Crystal Palace lose appeal against demotion from Europa League to Conference League

articles.description: Everton are progressing in talks to sign Jack Grealish on a season-long loan deal from Manchester City.
articles.title: Jack Grealish: Everton talks progress over Manchester City winger

articles.description: Spain's women's national team announce Sonia Bermudez as Montse Tome's replacement.
articles.title: Montse Tome: Spain part ways with head coach and appoint Sonia Bermudez as successor

articles.description: The Spanish FA approves plans to host December's La Liga match between Villarreal and Barcelona in the USA.
articles.title: Spanish FA approves plans to play Villarreal-Barcelona La Liga match in USA

articles.description: Illia Zabarnyi is expected to seal a move to Paris St-Germain for a fee more than double what Bournemouth initially paid to sign the defender in 2023.
articles.title: Illia Zabarnyi: Bournemouth defender nears £57m move to PSG

articles.description: Two Norwegian ski jumpers and three team officials are charged following allegations of tampering with ski suits, the sport's governing body announces.
articles.title: Norwegian ski jumpers charged for using 'cheating' jumpsuits

articles.description: Follow live text and score updates as Emma Raducanu faces world number one Aryna Sabalenka in the third round of the Cincinnati Open.
articles.title: Emma Raducanu vs Aryna Sabalenka LIVE: Cincinnati Open 2025 tennis - scores & updates

articles.description: Manchester Originals face London Spirit in the women's Hundred - follow live scores, radio commentary and updates.
articles.title: The Hundred 2025 LIVE: Manchester Originals vs London Spirit - cricket score, radio & updates

articles.description: Travis Hunter shows up well, Patrick Mahomes may have a new minder and rookie quarterbacks have differing fortunes in their pre-season openers.
articles.title: NFL pre-season review & results: Hunter, Sanders & Dallas Cowboys

articles.description: Tottenham express interest in signing Brazil winger Savinho during talks with Manchester City.
articles.title: Tottenham open talks with Manchester City to sign Brazil winger Savinho
